manager-config.description: 新增broker时，添加默认的用户，用户组，用户和用户组关系，用户组权限数据库脚本

properties.property: insert into mq_users (broker_id, user_id, user_name, user_password) values (?, ?, 'system', 'manager')
insert into mq_group (broker_id, group_id, group_name) values (?, ?, 'admin')

list.property: insert into mq_permissions (resource_type, res_name, res_op, group_type, group_name, broker_id, author, auth_date) values ('queue', '>', 'write', 'group', 'admin', ?, 'admin', sysdate)
insert into mq_permissions (resource_type, res_name, res_op, group_type, group_name, broker_id, author, auth_date) values ('queue', '>', 'read', 'group', 'admin', ?, 'admin', sysdate)
insert into mq_permissions (resource_type, res_name, res_op, group_type, group_name, broker_id, author, auth_date) values ('queue', '>', 'write', 'group', 'admin', ?, 'admin', sysdate)
insert into mq_permissions (resource_type, res_name, res_op, group_type, group_name, broker_id, author, auth_date) values ('queue', '>', 'read', 'group', 'admin', ?, 'admin', sysdate)

map.property: insert into mq_permissions (resource_type, res_name, res_op, group_type, group_name, broker_id, author, auth_date) values ('queue', '>', 'write', 'group', 'admin', ?, 'admin', sysdate)
insert into mq_permissions (resource_type, res_name, res_op, group_type, group_name, broker_id, author, auth_date) values ('queue', '>', 'read', 'group', 'admin', ?, 'admin', sysdate)

set.property: insert into mq_permissions (resource_type, res_name, res_op, group_type, group_name, broker_id, author, auth_date) values ('queue', '>', 'write', 'group', 'admin', ?, 'admin', sysdate)
insert into mq_permissions (resource_type, res_name, res_op, group_type, group_name, broker_id, author, auth_date) values ('queue', '>', 'read', 'group', 'admin', ?, 'admin', sysdate)
